1.0.name: wordpress/persian-fonts
1.0.description:
DONT UPDATE or DOWNLOAD "PERSIAN FONTS 1.3" TILL VERSION 1.4 !! [ under development ] please download version 1.2 !

One of the worst problems after translation is editing the fonts of the website. This plugin makes it fast and easy for you !

Features

  • "Easy fonts replacement
  • "Fully compatible with all browser !
  • "Includes 40+ standard and optimized Persian Fonts !

What's Next?

The plugin is under development. Please try it and contact me if you encounter any bugs or have any questions or suggestions.
